exam.title: Acceptance Exam
exam.description: Complete this exam to gain access to the learning platform. Read the instructions carefully before starting.
exam.instruction1: Once you start the exam, the timer will begin counting down.
exam.instruction2: You cannot pause or restart the exam once started.
exam.instruction3: Make sure you have a stable internet connection.
exam.submitConfirmation: Are you sure you want to submit your exam?
exam.unansweredWarning: You have {{count}} unanswered questions. Are you sure you want to submit?
exam.failedToStart: Failed to start the exam. Please try again.
exam.waitingForResult: Your exam has been submitted. Please wait for the results.
exam.failedToSubmit: Failed to submit the exam. Please try again.
exam.noQuestions: No questions found for this exam.
exam.noExamForGrade: There is no acceptance exam available for your grade level at this time.
exam.cannotStartNoQuestions: This exam has no questions and cannot be started.
exam.timeUpMessage: Your exam time has ended. Please submit your answers now.

waiting.title: Awaiting Results
waiting.description: Your acceptance exam has been submitted successfully. Our team is reviewing your answers.
waiting.checkBack: Please check back later or wait for an email notification with your results.

rejected.title: Application Not Accepted
rejected.description: Unfortunately, your acceptance exam results did not meet the required criteria.
rejected.message: Your application has not been accepted at this time.
rejected.contact: If you have any questions, please contact our support team.
